availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph Earley (Shelby County, Kentucky, prosecution witness)

body.p: Shelby County, Kentucky, prosecution witness. Kentucky native. Summoned as a prosecution witness in a trial in Shelby County in September 1861. Owned two enslaved persons in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Shelby County, District 2, p. 24.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Shelby County, District 7, p. 535B.
